doc.title: Emergency: Fighters for Life
doc.plot: Emergency - Fighters for Life from Topware is a real-time strategy game. You're controlling a group of cops, doctors and fire-fighters and you have to save as many people as possible from emergency. This game contains a large variety of different missions to solve, for example you have to rescue people involved in a car accident, you have to bring down a large fire of a building or you have to prepare a Formula 1 racing match!
